clinical_study.brief_title: Indexed Aortic Area in Bicuspid Aortic Valve Aortopathy
clinical_study.official_title: Relationship Between Indexed Aortic Area and Aortic Diameter in Bicuspid Aortic Valve Aortopathy: A Retrospective Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to determine the relationship between the cross-sectional aortic area/patient height ratio (indexed aortic area) and absolute aortic diameter in proximal thoracic aortic aneurysms associated with a bicuspid valve. This will shed light on whether aneurysms with smaller diameters than those recommended for surgical intervention by guidelines are still at risk of aortic complications attending an abnormally high indexed aortic area.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Data collection period from 27th January 2017 - 15th May 2017

primary_outcome.measure: Cross-sectional aortic area/patient height ratio in aneurysms
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data collection period from 27th January 2017 - 15th May 2017
primary_outcome.description: Calculation of indexed aortic area in aneurysms

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of aneurysms with cross-sectional aortic area/patient height ratio >10 cm2/m
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data collection period from 27th January 2017 - 15th May 2017
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of aneurysms with an abnormal indexed aortic area

primary_outcome.measure: Median cross-sectional aortic area/patient height ratio for aneurysms with diameter <4.0 cm, 4.0-4.5 cm, 4.5-5.0 cm, 5.0-5.5 cm and >5.5 cm
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data collection period from 27th January 2017 - 15th May 2017

primary_outcome.measure: Median aortic diameter corresponding to aneurysms with IAA >10 cm2/m
primary_outcome.time_frame: Data collection period from 27th January 2017 - 15th May 2017

intervention.description: Replacement of aneurysmal proximal thoracic aorta +/- replacement of diseased bicuspid aortic valve

study_pop.textblock: All consecutive adult patients undergoing first-time surgery for a BAV-related aneurysm involving the aortic root and/or ascending aorta, between 2010-2016 at our institution

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age >18 years
- First-time surgery
- Bicuspid aortic valve confirmed
- Thoracic aortic aneurysm involving aortic root or ascending aorta
Exclusion Criteria:
- No available pre-operative cross-sectional imaging
- Re-do surgery
